explains: n. 证明，证据；遗嘱，遗言；（人与上帝间的）圣约；（基督教的）圣约书（Testament）
wordGroup: old testament 基督教的《旧约全书》
new testament n. [圣经]新约全书
last will and testament 临终遗嘱

sentences.en: This is the last will and testament of...
It's a set of images that couldn't be more foreign or more alien to the prophetic mode of the old testament prophets.
sentences.cn: 这是一组不能再背离旧约先知的形象的一组比喻了。

sentences.en: The Old Testament prophet had said, "All flesh is grass." It is an important verse for the new dispensation of Christianity.
sentences.cn: 旧约先知曾说:“凡有血气的，尽都如草”。这是基督教新派的重要经文。
